sense.gloss: (in a) long time, long time (ago), while (ago), long ago, long while (ago), (in a) long while

sdata.j: ↑久々↑↓|ひさびさ|↓に↑聞↑↓き↓いたこの↑曲↑↓きょく↓。なつかしい。
sdata.e: Hearing this song after so long really brings back the old times.

sdata.j: ↑今↑↓いま↓は、↑来月↑↓らいげつ↓の↑海外↑↓かいがい↓↑旅行↑↓りょこう↓のことでもう↑頭↑↓あたま↓がいっぱいよ。だって、↑久々↑↓|ひさびさ|↓なんだもん。
sdata.e: All I can think about is next month's vacation. I haven't been on one in so long.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓はうちの↑部署↑↓ぶしょ↓に↑来↑↓き↓た↑久々↑↓|ひさびさ|↓の↑大型↑↓おおがた↓↑新人↑↓しんじん↓です。
sdata.e: This is the first time in a while that someone we had such high hopes for came to our department.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓も、ほんとに↑久々↑↓|ひさびさ|↓に↑家庭↑↓かてい↓でくつろいだ↑時間↑↓じかん↓を↑過↑↓す↓ごしたって↑感↑↓かん↓じ。
sdata.e: I also really had the feeling of having had a relaxed day with my family for the first time in a long while.

sdata.j: 「↑哺乳↑↓ほにゅう↓↑瓶↑↓びん↓」なんて↑言葉↑↓ことば↓、↑久々↑↓|ひさびさ|↓に↑聞↑↓き↓いたよ。
sdata.e: It's been a long time since I've heard the word "baby bottle".

sdata.j: ↑昨日↑↓きのう↓は↑久々↑↓|ひさびさ|↓に↑運動↑↓うんどう↓らしい↑運動↑↓うんどう↓をしたので、↑今朝↑↓けさ↓↑起↑↓お↓きたら↑全身↑↓ぜんしん↓が↑筋肉↑↓きんにく↓↑痛↑↓つう↓になっていた。
sdata.e: Yesterday was the first time in a long time that I really worked out, so all the muscles in my body ached when I woke up this morning.

sdata.j: ↑昨日↑↓きのう↓、↑久々↑↓|ひさびさ|↓に↑時間↑↓じかん↓ができたから、↑泳↑↓およ↓ぎに↑行↑↓い↓ったんだ。
sdata.e: Yesterday I had some free time for the first time in a long time, so I went swimming.

sdata.j: トムは↑久々↑↓|ひさびさ|↓に↑外↑↓そと↓に↑出↑↓で↓た。
sdata.e: Tom went outside for the first time in a long time.
It's been a while since I've had pasta.
